records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within the operational area is redacted.
records.context_note: A Frontex Human Resources individual deployed in an operational area in Greece tested positive for COVID-19, developed a fever, and was admitted to a local hospital for examination and treatment. The individual was later discharged and continued home self-isolation.
records.evidence_quote: COVID positive Text Removed - Human Resources accepted in a hospital

records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within the operational area is redacted.

records.context_note: A road traffic accident occurred in an operational area in Albania involving two vehicles, one of which was a Frontex Technical Equipment vehicle. Two Frontex Human Resources individuals sustained injuries (head wound, broken tooth, eyelid trauma, bruises) and were transported to a local emergency unit. The Albanian driver of the other vehicle was also transported for examination. No fatalities were reported.
records.evidence_quote: 2 Text Removed - Human Resources were transported by Albanian ambulance to the Text Removed - Reporting Tools Emergency Unit, where they received specific medical treatment.

records.context_note: A Frontex Human Resources individual deployed in the Evros Operational Area, Greece, fell ill with cough and shortness of breathing, tested negative for COVID-19, but was later hospitalized due to a blood clot in a lung blood vein. The patient was transferred to another hospital and eventually recovered.
records.evidence_quote: Text Removed - Personal Data had a blood clot in a lung blood vein.

possible_violations.legal_basis: Protocol of the Government's session of 2 August 2021 and decision of the Minister of Interior, paragraph 3

records.context_note: During an operational flight over the Lithuania-Belarus border, a Frontex crew detected and observed 4 migrants. The search was halted due to low fuel. In a related incident, 5 persons were subjected to preventive measures and directed from Lithuanian territory, consistent with a national protocol for border management.
records.evidence_quote: the crew detected and were observing the migrants in the area of Text Removed Operational Area in Lithuania. The search had to be stopped due to the fuel left to the aircraft.

possible_violations.legal_basis: Protocol of the Government's session of 2 August 2021 and decision of the Minister of Interior, paragraph 3

records.context_note: Frontex detected a fire in a wood on Lithuanian ground near the Belarusian border, where a group of seven adults and three children were found. Ground forces returned the group to Belarus, a practice that had occurred four times previously with this group, consistent with a national protocol for border management.
records.evidence_quote: the detected group were seven adults and three children and the ground forces returned them back to Belarus, as it was done with this group four times before.

records.where_clear: Farm in an Operational Area in Lithuania
records.uncertainty_note: Specific farm and location within Lithuania are redacted.

possible_violations.legal_basis: Protocol of the Government's session of 2 August 2021 and decision of the Minister of Interior, paragraph 3

records.context_note: A family of irregular migrants from Iraq (one female adult, a 13-year-old girl, and an 8-year-old boy) was encountered at a farm in an operational area in Lithuania. Medical assistance was provided, and the male adult was taken to the hospital for leg pain, where no fracture was found. Four persons from the group were subjected to preventive measures and directed from Lithuanian territory, consistent with a national protocol for border management.
records.evidence_quote: Medical Assistance was required on the scene and the male was taken to the hospital for investigations.

records.context_note: A group of 9 irregular migrants from Iraq (2 adult males, 1 adult female, 4 minor females) were apprehended after crossing the Belarus-Lithuania border. They were transferred for COVID-19 testing and further investigations. Preventive measures were applied, and the persons were directed from Lithuanian territory, consistent with a national protocol for border management.
records.evidence_quote: 9 persons were apprehended after crossing the border from BLR to LTU. They were transferred to Text Removed - Operational Area for Covid 19 testing and further investigations.
